cons: Poorly rated for job security by some employees

social_snippets.quote: Working as a freelance 3D artist, Ctruh allowed me the setup basic 3D scenes and VR/AR without coding.
Ctruh is a 3D editor tool that helps businesses design immersive experiences using a no-code application.
Ctruh has an employee rating of 4.9 out of 5 stars, based on 32 company reviews on Glassdoor...

alerts: Employee reviews on AmbitionBox rate job security, salary, and promotions poorly.
